resources.string: Taco-bout a mess! We ran into an error when trying to do that
Show on-boarding the next time you open the app
Orange to the right, tacos in sight!
Orange to the left, move on to the rest.
Green is keen to lead the way.

string-array.name: pop_up_options
string-array.item: Are you enjoying the app? Rate it now in the Play Store!
Victoria just tried a new recipe. What recipe are you trying this week?
Jenn rated her favorite recipe 1 minute ago. Why don\'t you help others by rating yours?
Ellen made tacos on Tuesday 5 weeks in a row. Beat her streak!
Gabriella created her own taco recipe. Congratulate her!
How are you liking this app? Let\'s taco-bout it. Answer this five minute survey!
Lettuce help you find your next Taco Tuesday recipe! Swipe right on your next find.
Did you find a recipe you dislike? Nacho type of taco? Leave a rating on the details screen.
Sorry to be jalapeno grill. Do you mind taking a second to rate the app?
Spec-taco-lar! You saved your first recipe. Ready to get cooking?
Having issues with the app? We can taco-ver the phone. Contact support now.
Don\'t get caught naked! Shop for tortillas and other ingredients now $$$
Do you have a bad queso the munchies? Try one of our delicious taco recipes!
Have some feedback? You can tell us. We won\'t spill the beans.
Season the day! Try tacos on a day other than Tuesday. Tacos every day!
Let\'s not burrito round the bush. You\'re our favorite customer!
Taco chance on that recipe you\'re not sure about. You might end up loving it!
Do you have the best taco pun? Share it with us on our forum!
Taco Throw Back Thursday time! What is the best taco recipe you\'ve ever made?
Ready for Taco Tuesday? How about you use one of our tried and true recipes.
